rev.desc.rev.desc: Modification made for CenterPoint Task 22900 for Request 24287

Because the spelling of some currencies were changed, and the currency name is a unique key to the currency file, a fix had to be made so that the correct spelling of the currency is stored in the file.
See the MSWord document named Tsk22900Rqs24287 for details of what was done.

descript.descript: Modification made for CenterPoint Task 22900 for Request 24287
